docs.title: Biography
docs.text: I am a first-year Ph.D. student in Soochow University, where I am a member of Soochow NLP Lab, majored in software engineering. I am advised by Prof. Qiaoming Zhu and Prof. Peifeng Li. Before that, I obtained the bachelor degree from China University of Petroleum (East China) , QinDao Institute Of Software, College Of Computer Science And Technology in 2022.

docs.title: Publications
docs.text:
Two-stage Incomplete Utterance Rewriting on Editing Operation

Zhiyu Cao, Peifeng Li, Qiaoming Zhu, Yaxin Fan Proceedings of the 31st International Conference on Computational Linguistics COLING 2025 | Paper

Incomplete Utterance Rewriting with Editing Operation Guidance and Utterance Augmentation

Zhiyu Cao, Peifeng Li, Yaxin Fan, Qiaoming Zhu Proceedings of the 2024 Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing EMNLP 2024 | Paper

docs.title: Honors & Awards
docs.text:
• First National Prize, The 15th LanQiao Cup, June 2024
